caller_intent: Sandra Hayes wants to pay her auto insurance premium by check for her Progressive policy.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the policy type (Progressive) and requested payment details.
Collected routing number (253177049) and account number (31712123) for the check payment.
Notified Sandra the payment was successful and offered to send a confirmation number via email.
summary: Sandra Hayes called Alliance Insurance to pay her Progressive auto insurance premium by check. The agent verified banking details, processed the $251.05 payment, and confirmed successful transaction with an email confirmation offer. The call concluded with Sandra indicating no further assistance was needed.
